name: Confused Christmas 2 PC
description:
Oh no! It seems that a witch has used magic to mix up all of our presents and decorations. We have to sort through them before Christmas or no one will get their presents, and Christmas will be ruined! Please, dear human, help us save Christmas!

 Confused Christmas 2 is a secular Christmas themed game with bouncy Christmas music.   It consists of 75 levels with three different games that can be played in casual or expert mode.  It has a fun, short story segment that appears every 3rd level.

 Music, sounds and the story can be turned on or off from the settings menu.

  Path Find:

  •   Help the elves find their matching presents by laying out a route between the elves and their presents.  Collect two cookies along the way for gold. 
  • In expert mode you have a limited amount of tiles for each color. In casual mode there's no limit.
  • There is no timer here - you can take as long as you want to.  They won't start moving until you press the Start button.

 

Tag Match:

  •   Find the present that matches the gift tag on the left. 
  • In expert mode you have to find it in time before the next tag appears.
  • In casual mode you can take as long as you want to - you can also skip a picture.
  • You only need to find 25 out of 30 to pass the level.
  • Limited wrong clicks on presents allowed. 

 

Memory Find:

  •   Find the present or decoration that is identical to the one shown, however, the item you have to find gradually disappears and you have to remember what it was.
  • In expert mode you have to find it in time before the next item appears.
  • In casual mode you can take as long as you want to - you can also skip an image.  You only need to find 25 out of 30 to pass the level.
  • Limited wrong clicks on items allowed.

This game is also available for Android devices.

System Requirements

  • Operating system: Windows XP and higher at least 1 Gig RAM
  • The game is written in landscape format in resolution 1280x720 you can play it window mode or full screen - it will stretch to fit a larger monitor.
  • If you play it on a square monitor it will create black bars top and bottom.
